title: Product Demo Request
description: A qualified lead has requested a live product demonstration.

tasks.description: Review the lead's details to understand their industry and needs to tailor the demo.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a demo script focused on the lead's specific use case.

tasks.description: Conduct a live, personalized demo of the product, focusing on the features most relevant to the lead.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully demonstrates the value of the product.

tasks.description: Follow up after the demo with a summary email and a quote.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a timely and professional follow-up.
